code: import React,{useState}from'react';import StarObject from'../starObject';import configs from'../../configs';const{stars}=configs;const STARS_RADIOUS=480;const MINIMUM_RADIOUS=1;const STARS_AMOUNT=stars.dencity||900;function getRandomInt(max,min){const plusOrMinus=Math.random()<0.5?-1:1;return Math.random()*max*plusOrMinus;}const calculateRandomPostion=()=>{const position=Array.from({length:3},()=>getRandomInt(STARS_RADIOUS,MINIMUM_RADIOUS));return position;};function StarsField(props){const[stars]=useState(Array.from({length:STARS_AMOUNT},()=>({position:calculateRandomPostion()})));return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("group",null,stars.map(star=>/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(StarObject,{key:JSON.stringify(star.position),position:star.position})));}export default StarsField;
